about_the_game:
Embark on a challenging journey as you take on the role of a golden bouncy artifact with a singular goal: reach the top of an ancient, enigmatic tower. But beware, for this tower has a will of its own and will stop at nothing to manipulate you to abandon your quest.

1000 meters of challenges

Scale a kilometer-high tower filled with treacherous obstacles, each more deadly than the next.

Easy to learn, hard to master

With simple and intuitive physics-based controls, brace yourself for a true test of skill and precision as you navigate increasingly demanding challenges.

Sentient system

Immerse yourself in an unexpected journey with a living tower, as she communicates through a vast array of sentences displayed on her walls. Featuring over 1000 unique sentences reflecting moods such as irony, despair, anger, boredom, and much more, you will be drawn into a battle of wits and willpower as you strive to conquer the tower's formidable challenges, all while enduring her relentless provocations.

For those that decide to buy the game, thank you so so much, it means the world to me!!! And remember:

May your climb be swift and your determination unbreakable!

name: A Tower's Will

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Processor: Intel(R) Core(TM) i5-9300H
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: RTX 2060 Mobile
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: With this pc, the game runs at 1080p - 75fps or 720p - 85fps with shadows On and max reflections. The game also supports FSR 3.1.1 and Frame Generation if you want to increase fps.

short_description: A Tower’s Will is a 3D platform game where you have to climb a sentient tower that doesn’t want to be climbed. Will you rise victorious or tumble down in defeat?
supported_languages: English, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Arabic, Bulgarian, Czech, Danish, Dutch, Finnish, Greek, Hungarian, Indonesian, Japanese, Korean, Polish, Portuguese - Brazil, Portuguese - Portugal, Romanian, Russian, Simplified Chinese, Spanish - Latin America, Swedish, Thai, Traditional Chinese, Turkish, Ukrainian, Vietnamese, Hindi, Malay, Slovak, Norwegian
